title: Object not fetched because its identifier appears to be already in processing
description:
While indexing job is running seeing the below message for all the objects. What is the issue and how to resolve this so that indexing can work. Thank you.

Object not fetched because its identifier appears to be already in processing

comments.content:
Please ask your question on the solr-user mailing list first. If it is determined to be a bug instead of a usage/configuration issue then a Jira issue should be opened.

http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc
comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar

comments.content:
Information Classification: ll Limited Access

Hi Shalin,

I have sent an email but no response yet. You are the top most expert with this software.
Could you please take a look and advice?

Thank you,
Dutt
comments.author: Venkata Bhanu Dutt
